controller.chatbot
Class Chatbot

java.lang.Object
  controller.chatbot.Chatbot

public class Chatbot
extends Object

The Chatbot currently stores all the knowledge base and respond list data to provide users with auto-mated messaging. The Chatbot can be turn on/off from the Contact List by simply clicking the Chatbot Enabled.
